Name: The Curse Of Esrevni
About the game: The Curse Of Esrevni is a 2-4 player multiplayer board game. The aim of the game is to survive by getting rid of various obstacles and traps. In the meantime, you can set various traps on your opponents. Anything can happen, be careful! Don't give up ! Features Ascending level game system Trap setting Attack the opponent Skill cards Lucky cards Freecam
